source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is an architectural scenery shot looking up from the bottom of a multi-story, rectangular stairwell, creating a dizzying, vertiginous perspective. The view spirals upwards, framed by the repeating geometry of dark, ornate wrought-iron railings and white support columns set against warm, orange-toned walls. There is no main subject because the focus is on conveying the scale and atmosphere of the interior space. The shot's purpose is to highlight the architectural design and create a sense of immense height, rather than to center on a specific person or object.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: The support column set is dark brown, and the white parts are other building components.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The support columns are actually dark brown, while the white elements are other components of the building.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The support columns are actually dark brown, while the white elements are other components of the building.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This is an architectural scenery shot looking up from the bottom of a multi-story, rectangular stairwell, creating a dizzying, vertiginous perspective. The view spirals upwards, framed by the repeating geometry of dark, ornate wrought-iron railings and dark brown support columns set against warm, orange-toned walls. White elements of the building add contrast to the scene. There is no main subject because the focus is on conveying the scale and atmosphere of the interior space. The shot's purpose is to highlight the architectural design and create a sense of immense height, rather than to center on a specific person or object.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is an architectural scenery shot looking up from the bottom of a multi-story, rectangular stairwell, creating a dizzying, vertiginous perspective. The view spirals upwards, framed by the repeating geometry of dark, ornate wrought-iron railings and dark brown support columns set against warm, orange-toned walls. White elements of the building add contrast to the scene. There is no main subject because the focus is on conveying the scale and atmosphere of the interior space. The shot's purpose is to highlight the architectural design and create a sense of immense height, rather than to center on a specific person or object.

bad_caption: A group of three young women, each wearing brightly colored athletic tracksuits—one in blue, one in yellow, and one in green—are jogging side by side along a wide, sunlit outdoor path. All three have long hair tied back in ponytails and are wearing white sneakers. The woman in the center, who has light skin and a red headband, is holding a water bottle in her right hand. The woman on the left, with medium skin and curly hair, is glancing over at the woman on the right, who has dark skin and is smiling. The path is lined with tall, leafy trees, and the women are moving toward the camera in a relaxed, synchronized stride. There are no other people or vehicles visible, and the focus is on the group as they exercise together.
